applicant-name.name: SHANGHAI RUNHE KEHUA ENG DESIGN CO LTD
上海润和科华工程设计有限公司

invention-title: Improved tire pyrolysis oil hydrodeep processing system
一种改进型轮胎裂解油加氢深加工系统

abstract.p: The invention discloses an improved tire pyrolysis oil hydrogenation deep processing system, relates to the field of tire pyrolysis oil deep processing, and mainly aims at solving the problems that a tire pyrolysis oil deep processing technology is complex in process and product distribution is not easy to adjust. The main structure is as follows: the lower part of a hot high-pressure separator is connected with a hot low-pressure separator, and the upper part is connected with a cold high-pressure separator; the lower part of the cold high-pressure separator is connected with the cold low-pressure separator, and the upper part of the cold high-pressure separator is connected with the hydrogen concentrator through a hydrogen circulating branch pipe; the upper part of the hydrogen concentrator is connected with a new hydrogen input pipe through a concentrated hydrogen conveying pipe, and the lower part of the hydrogen concentrator is connected with the fractionator through a stripping gas conveying pipe; the lower part of the hot low-pressure separator is connected with the fractionator, and the upper part is connected with the cold low-pressure separator; the lower part of the cold low-pressure separator is connected with a fractionator; and a heavy oil output pipe at the lower part of the fractionator is connected with an inlet of the feeding tank through a heavy oil circulating branch pipe with a control valve. Hydrogen energy can be saved, product distribution can be flexibly adjusted, meanwhile, product oil can be prevented from carrying water, and the product quality is improved.

本发明公开了一种改进型轮胎裂解油加氢深加工系统，涉及轮胎裂解油深加工领域，主要用于解决轮胎裂解油深加工技术流程复杂、产品分布不易调整的问题。其主要结构为：热高压分离器下部与热低压分离器连接，上部与冷高压分离器连接；冷高压分离器下部与冷低压分离器连接，上部通过氢循环支管与氢提浓器连接；氢提浓器上部通过提浓氢输送管与新氢输入管连接，下部通过汽提气输送管与分馏器连接；热低压分离器下部与分馏器连接，上部与冷低压分离器连接；冷低压分离器下部与分馏器连接，分馏器下部的重油输出管通过带控制阀门的重油循环支管与进料罐进口连接。本发明能节约氢能源，灵活调整产品分布，同时能避免产品油带水，使产品质量提高。
